Location: Tarantulas' Old Secret Lair
Time: Sometime towards midnight

    "Faster, you fools!" The snivel, treacherous voice rang out through the 
cavernous, web covered lair.  Many small insectoid-like drones about the size 
of a football worked frivolously on their overbearing "master," though they 
lacked the sentient status to know this. The each, in turn, crawled from here 
to there, piece by piece, placing scraps of metal and familiar bits in a 
pile. That pile, in turn was being places intricately together. Through this 
small "factory" of sorts, one could make out the very Tarantulas who was 
thought dead. Obviously, with his small spider drones, he was rebuilt; maybe 
good as new. But with their help, his lair was coming by perfect. Computers 
lit up once in a while, the large nearby energon deposit supplying a great 
enough power to keep everything maintained. "Yess...they will see what its 
like to cross the great arachnid, Tarantulas...yess....".

(( OOC: I just wanted to add, this isn't my best work...I just wanted to get 
this done. ))
